usdl.servicemodel

Class PricePlan

  • java.lang.Object
    • usdl.servicemodel.PricePlan

  • public class PricePlan
extends java.lang.Object
    The PricePlan class represents an instance of a PricePlan resource of the LinkedUSDL Pricing model.
    Version:
    1.0, March 06
    Author:
    Daniel Barrigas, Jorge Araujo

      • addPriceComponent

        public void addPriceComponent(PriceComponent pc)
        Adds a Price Component to the Price Plan.
        Parameters:
        pc - Price Component to be added to the Price Plan.

      • removePriceComponentAt

        public void removePriceComponentAt(int index)
        Removes a Price Component from the Price Plan.
        Parameters:
        index - Position of the Price Component that is to be eliminated.

      • calculatePrice

        public java.lang.String calculatePrice(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model model)
        Calculates the price value of the Price Plan. The price value is the sum of each its Price Components.
        Returns:
        A PriceSpec instance that contains the price value of the Price Plan.

      • readFromModel

        public static PricePlan readFromModel(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Resource resource,
                      com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model model)
        Reads a PricePlan object from the Semantic Model.
        Parameters:
        resource - The Resource object of the PricePlan.
        model - Model where the resource is located.
        Returns:
        A PricePlan object populated with its information extracted from the Semantic Model.

      • writeToModel

        public void writeToModel(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Resource owner,
                com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model model,
                java.lang.String baseURI)
        Creates a Resource representation of the PricePlan instance and writes it into the passed model.
        Parameters:
        owner - Resource that is linked to this object.
        model - Model to where the object is to be written on.
